map.noMapAvailable: There is no map available right now

fastaWear.title: Fasta-Wear
fastaWear.text:
Have you ordered wear?
It can be retrieved in the Information after you have checked in. State your name and participant number and you will receive your wear.

This year, all registered participants will receive a name tag. It can be found in the Information section under Fastaval.

lostAndFound.title: Glemte sager
lostAndFound.text: Har du mistet eller fundet noget? Gå til Informationen for at få hjælp!
